dialogue.speaker: King Arin
dialogue.text: Welcome, brave adventurer, to the land of Eridoria. I have summoned you for a quest of great importance.

dialogue.speaker: Eira Shadowglow
dialogue.text: I sense darkness gathering in the north, Your Majesty. What news do you bring?

dialogue.speaker: King Arin
dialogue.text: A dark sorcerer has stolen the ancient artifact known as the Star Crystal. We need someone brave to retrieve it for us.
